comment: He is a great professor. He grades pretty slowly but is super lenient on grading. You have 3 free absences, but after that, it starts affecting your grade. He does a lot of group work and these presentations every Thursday, where you have to find an article and explain it to the class. An easy class if you just put in some effort.

This professor cares about his students and acknowledges that we are maturing adults and may have other obligations outside his class. He makes the lectures engaging and is lenient on both the lecture structure and assignments/due dates. I wish there were a tad less in-class group assignments, but overall, an amazing professor.
Very easy class! 50% of your grade is on presentation and attendance, as long as you email him an excuse to why you cant make it to class your fine. All assignments where essays but fairly easy

Great professor with a strong passion for his teaching and research background. He tailors the class according to what the student needs. There's lots of reading and writing though, so be prepared to be a researcher yourself. Overall he's an awesome professor who puts his students first and is willing to get them to succeed.

IHS3010. Awesome professor, super knowledgeable and loves his job. Every other week you research an article and talk about it for like 3-5 mins and there are reflections papers every other week too. Easy grader, this class was fun.
Dr Lyons is a true mentor. He is extremely Accessible outside of class and genualy takes care of his students. if you're looking for a professor to truly help your growth take a class with him
He is a very helpful professor!

Passionate about what he's teaching. Amazing professor. We had a research project to completer all semester and it was great although its a lot he works with you as long as you communicate with him. Would definitely take him again.
